vlive.english: Why are you butting into our business?

examples.korean: I won’t interfere—it’s your show. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 난 참견하지 않을래. 그건 네 일이니까. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: He’s an interfering old busybody! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 간섭하고 참견하기 좋아하는 늙은이야! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: Butt out, Neil! This is none of your business. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 참견 마, 닐! 이건 너와 상관없는 일이야. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: I didn’t ask you to butt in on my private business. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 너더러 내 사적인 일에 참견해 달라고 부탁한 적 없어. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: I’m sure she doesn’t want us horning in on her business. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 틀림없이 우리가 자기 일에 참견하는 것을 원하지 않을 거야. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
